strings.value: Salom Rashid! Hafta oxiri nima qilding?

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: Hi Rashid! What did you do on the weekend?

strings.value: Salom Kamola! Men shanba kuni futbol o'ynadim. Sen-chi?

context.speaker: Rashid
context.en_line: Hi Kamola! I played football on Saturday. How about you?

strings.value: Men uyda dam oldim va televizor ko'rdim.

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: I rested at home and watched TV.

context.speaker: Rashid
context.en_line: Good! What did you do on Sunday?

strings.value: Men do'stlarimni ziyorat qildim. Biz muzeyga bordik.

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: I visited my friends. We went to the museum.

context.speaker: Rashid
context.en_line: Wonderful! Was the museum interesting?

strings.value: Ha, juda qiziqarli edi! Biz ko'p narsalarni ko'rdik.

context.speaker: Kamola
context.en_line: Yes, it was very interesting! We saw many things.

strings.value: Men ham keyingi hafta muzeyga boraman!

context.speaker: Rashid
context.en_line: I will go to the museum next week too!

context.speaker: Anvar
context.en_line: Hi Zarina! Did you come to school yesterday?

strings.value: Yo'q, men maktabga kelmadim. Men uyda edim.

context.speaker: Zarina
context.en_line: No, I didn't come to school. I was at home.

context.speaker: Anvar
context.en_line: Why? Were you sick?

strings.value: Yo'q, men kasal emas edim. Faqat charchagan edim.

context.speaker: Zarina
context.en_line: No, I wasn't sick. I was just tired.

context.speaker: Anvar
context.en_line: I understand. What did you do at home?

strings.value: Men kitob o'qidim va musiqa tingladim. Sen nima qilding?

context.speaker: Zarina
context.en_line: I read a book and listened to music. What did you do?

strings.value: Men maktabga bordim va matematika o'qidim.

context.speaker: Anvar
context.en_line: I went to school and studied math.

context.speaker: Zarina
context.en_line: Good! Now I'm at school too!

strings.value: Salom Nigora! O'tgan hafta nima qilding?

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: Hi Nigora! What did you do last week?

strings.value: Salom Sardor! Men juda ko'p narsalar qildim!

context.speaker: Nigora
context.en_line: Hi Sardor! I did many things!

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: Tell me! I want to hear.

strings.value: Dushanba kuni maktabda o'qidim. Seshanba kuni do'stlarimni ziyorat qildim.

context.speaker: Nigora
context.en_line: On Monday I studied at school. On Tuesday I visited my friends.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: Wonderful! Continue!

strings.value: Chorshanba kuni onamga uyda yordam berdim. Payshanba kuni kutubxonada kitob o'qidim.

context.speaker: Nigora
context.en_line: On Wednesday I helped my mother at home. On Thursday I read a book at the library.

context.speaker: Sardor
context.en_line: What about Friday?

strings.value: Juma kuni futbol o'ynadim va shanba kuni muzeyga bordim!

context.speaker: Nigora
context.en_line: On Friday I played football and on Saturday I went to the museum!

strings.value: Salom Jasur! Bu hafta juda band edim!

context.speaker: Feruza
context.en_line: Hi Jasur! This week I was very busy!

strings.value: Salom Feruza! Men ham! Nima qilding?

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Hi Feruza! Me too! What did you do?

strings.value: Men har kuni maktabda o'qidim. Keyin uyda yordam berdim.

context.speaker: Feruza
context.en_line: I studied at school every day. Then I helped at home.

strings.value: Men ham! Men onamga ovqat pishirishda yordam berdim.

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Me too! I helped my mother cook food.

strings.value: Ajoyib! Sen do'stlaring bilan vaqt o'tkazdingmi?

context.speaker: Feruza
context.en_line: Wonderful! Did you spend time with friends?

strings.value: Ha, chorshanba kuni do'stlarimni ziyorat qildim. Biz futbol o'ynadik.

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Yes, on Wednesday I visited my friends. We played football.

strings.value: Men ham payshanba kuni do'stlarim bilan muzeyga bordim!

context.speaker: Feruza
context.en_line: I also went to the museum with friends on Thursday!

strings.value: Endi dam olish vaqti! Hafta oxiri dam olamiz!

context.speaker: Jasur
context.en_line: Now it's time to rest! We'll rest on the weekend!

strings.value: Sen kecha dam oldingmi? Uyda yotdingmi?
Yo'q, men dam olmadim. Men futbol o'ynadim!
Ingliz tilida o'tmish zamon uchun fe'lga '-ed' qo'shiladi: play → played, watch → watched, visit → visited. Bu ODDIY (regular) fe'llar.
Mening akam maktabdan keyin kompyuter o'yinlari o'ynadi.
Yo'q, men o'qimadim. Men televizor ko'rdim.
'watch' oxiri '-ch' bilan tugaydi. '-ed' qo'shganda /t/ ovozi chiqadi: watched = /wɒtʃt/. '-ed' 3 xil talaffuz: /d/, /t/, /ɪd/.
Biz televizorda konsert ko'rdik chunki biz musiqani yaxshi ko'ramiz.
Sen kecha uyda edingmi? Hech kimga bormasdingmi?
Yo'q, men uyda emas edim. Men do'stlarimni ziyorat qildim.
Fe'l '-t' yoki '-d' bilan tugasa, '-ed' = /ɪd/ bo'ladi: visited, wanted, started. Bu uchunchi talaffuz.
U o'tgan hafta muzeyni ziyorat qildi.
Mening oilam kecha buvimni ziyorat qildi chunki biz uni yaxshi ko'ramiz.
Yo'q, men dam olmadim. Men ishladim.
'work' oxiri '-k' (jarangsiz) bilan tugaydi. Jarangsiz undoshdan keyin '-ed' = /t/: worked, walked, watched.
Mening onam kecha maktabda ishladi chunki u o'qituvchi.
Sen kecha avtobus oldingmi? Transport bilan bordingmi?
Yo'q, men avtobus olmadim. Men yurdim.
Barcha oddiy fe'llar bir xil qoida: play→played, walk→walked, work→worked. Faqat '-ed' qo'shing. Bu ODDIY (regular) pattern.
Biz bog'ga yurdik va futbol o'ynadik.
Sen kecha o'ynadingmi? Do'stlaring bilan vaqt o'tkazdingmi?
Fe'l undosh + 'y' bilan tugasa, 'y' → 'i' o'zgaradi: study → studied, carry → carried, worry → worried. Unli + 'y' bo'lsa, o'zgarmaydi: play → played.
Mening singlim butun kun o'qidi chunki uning imtihoni bor.
Yo'q, men uxlamadim. Men xonamni tozaladim.
'clean' oxiri '-n' (jarangli) bilan tugaydi. Jarangli undoshdan keyin '-ed' = /d/: cleaned, played, listened.
Biz har kuni maktabdan keyin xonamizni tozalaymiz.
Sen kecha televizor ko'rdingmi? Film ko'rdingmi?
Yo'q, men televizor ko'rmadim. Men musiqa tingladim.
'Listen' har doim 'to' bilan keladi: 'listen to music' (musiqani tinglash). 'Hear' esa predlogsiz: 'I heard music' (men musiqa eshitdim).
Mening akam guruh albomini tingladi chunki u musiqani yaxshi ko'radi.
'Did' o'zi o'tmishi ko'rsatadi, shuning uchun undan keyin BASE fe'l (asosiy shakl) keladi. 'Did' + base verb = o'tmish savol. XATO: 'Did you came/played/went'.
Nega 'Did you come' — 'Did you came' emas?

context.en_canonical: No, I didn't come to school.
No, I didn't come to school.
No, I didn't come to school.

strings.value: 'Didn't' o'zi o'tmishni ko'rsatadi. Shuning uchun ikkinchi fe'l BASE shaklda qoladi: didn't play, didn't go, didn't watch. XATO: didn't played, didn't went.
Biz konsertni ko'rmadik chunki biz baland musiqani yoqtirmaymiz.

context.en_canonical: Yes, I did. / No, I didn't.
Yes, I did. / No, I didn't.
Yes, I did. / No, I didn't.

strings.value: Qisqa javoblarda fe'lni takrorlamasdan 'did/didn't' bilan javob beramiz: 'Did you play?' → 'Yes, I did.' (not 'Yes, I played.'). Bu qisqartma qoida.
Nega 'Yes, I did' — 'Yes, I played' emas?
Futbol o'ynadingizmi? — Ha, o'ynadim. Men futbolni yaxshi ko'raman!
Do'stingiz sizga savol berdi. Javob bering.
Sen kecha jim edingmi? Hech kim bilan gaplashmasdingmi?

context.en_canonical: No, I talked with my friends.

strings.value: Yo'q, men jim emas edim. Men do'stlarim bilan gaplashdim.

context.en_canonical: No, I talked with my friends.
No, I talked with my friends.

strings.value: 'Talk with' = birga gaplashish (ikki tomon). 'Talk to' = biriga aytish (yo'nalish). Ikkalasi ham to'g'ri, 'with' — do'stona.
U maktabdan keyin o'qituvchisi bilan gaplashdi.
Mening onam kecha otam bilan bazm haqida gaplashdi.
Sen kecha uy vazifangni boshladingmi? Faqat boshladingmi?
Yo'q, men faqat boshlamadim. Men tugatdim!
'Finish' = tugatish, 'Start' = boshlash. Qarama-qarshi juftlik. 'I finished' = men tugatdim, 'I started' = men boshladim.
Biz kecha imtihonni tugatdik va xursand edik.
Sen kecha faqat o'zingga qaradingmi? Hech kimga yordam bermasdingmi?
Yo'q, men faqat o'zimga qaramadim. Men onamga yordam berdim.
'Help' + kishi + WITH + ish: 'I helped her with homework.' Yoki 'Help' + kishi + fe'l: 'I helped her cook.' Ikkalasi ham to'g'ri.
U akasiga uy vazifasida yordam berdi.
Mening otam menga yordam berdi chunki u juda mehribon.

context.en_canonical: No, I cooked food at home.

strings.value: Yo'q, men restoranda yemadim. Men uyda ovqat pishirdim.

context.en_canonical: No, I cooked food at home.
No, I cooked food at home.

strings.value: 'Cook' = fe'l (ovqat pishirmoq) va ism (oshpaz). 'I cooked dinner' = Men kechki ovqat pishirdim. 'She is a cook' = U oshpaz.
U kecha kechasi kechki ovqat pishirdi.
Mening onam kecha palov pishirdi chunki biz uni yaxshi ko'ramiz.
Sen kecha hech narsa qilmasdingmi? Dam oldingmi?
Yo'q, men dam olmadim. Men hisobotlarni tayyorladim.
Fe'l '-e' bilan tugasa, faqat '-d' qo'shiladi: prepare → prepared, live → lived, arrive → arrived. Ikki 'e' kerak emas.
Mening otam imtihonga tayyorgarlik ko'rdi chunki u har kuni o'qiydi.
Yo'q, men tugatmadim. Men faqat boshladim.
'start' oxiri '-t' bilan tugaydi. '-t' yoki '-d' dan keyin '-ed' = /ɪd/: started, visited, wanted, needed. Alohida bo'g'in.
Biz maktabdan keyin futbol o'ynashni boshladik.
Yo'q, men davom etmadim. Men to'xtatdim.
Qisqa unli + bitta undosh = undosh ikkilanadi: stop → stopped, plan → planned, drop → dropped. Bu imlo qoidasi.
Mening singlim televizor ko'rishni to'xtatdi chunki u uni yoqtirmaydi.
Yo'q, men chiqmadim. Men uyda qoldim.
Men uyda qoldim va dam oldim.
'Stay' = vaqtincha qolish (I stayed at a hotel). 'Live' = doimiy yashash (I live in Tashkent). 'Stay' = qisqa muddat.
Men uyda qoldim va dam oldim.
Biz bazmda qoldik chunki biz musiqa va raqsni yaxshi ko'ramiz.
'Arrive at' = kichik joy (at school, at the airport). 'Arrive in' = katta joy (in London, in Tashkent). 'Home' — predlogsiz: 'arrive home'.
Mening oilam kecha ertalab muzeyga keldi.
Yo'q, men dam olmadim. Men idishlarni yuvdim.
'wash' oxiri '-sh' (jarangsiz). Jarangsiz undoshdan keyin '-ed' = /t/: washed, watched, finished.
Mening onam mashinani yuvdi chunki u toza bo'lishini yaxshi ko'radi.
Sen kecha uxladingmi? Hech narsa qilmasdingmi?
Yo'q, men uxlamadim. Men pomidor terdim.
'Pick' = 1) termoq (pick tomatoes), 2) tanlash (pick a color). 'Choose' = faqat tanlash. 'Pick' kengroq.
Mening oilam kecha bodring terdi chunki bizda bog' bor.
Sen kecha bog'da hech narsa qilmasdingmi?
Yo'q, men dam olmadim. Men dalalarni sug'ordim.
'Water' = ism (suv) va fe'l (sug'ormoq). 'I drank water' = Men suv ichdim. 'I watered the plants' = Men o'simliklarni sug'ordim.
Mening otam har kuni sabzavotlarni sug'ordi chunki u bog'dorchilikni yaxshi ko'radi.
To'g'ri, men ekmadim. Men yig'ib oldim!
'Harvest' = hosil yig'ish, kuzda bo'ladi. 'Harvest' = ism (hosil, yig'im-terim) va fe'l (yig'ib olmoq). O'zbekistonda paxtani 'harvest' qilishadi.
Mening oilam o'tgan hafta sabzavotlarni yig'ib oldi chunki biz fermada ishlaymiz.
Yo'q, men pastga tushmadim. Men tog'ga chiqdim!
'Climb' so'zidagi 'b' talaffuz qilinmaydi: /klaɪm/. 'Climbed' = /klaɪmd/. Boshqa jim harfli so'zlar: 'bomb' /bɒm/, 'lamb' /læm/.
Biz tepaga chiqdik va juda charchagan edik.
Yo'q, men bu tarafda qolmadim. Men daryodan o'tdim!
'Cross' = o'tmoq, kesib o'tmoq. 'Cross the road' = ko'chadan o'tmoq. Bolalarni o'rgatishadi: 'Look left, look right, then cross the road.' Xavfsizlik!
Mening oilam kecha ko'prikdan o'tdi muzeyga borganimizda.
'Open ↔ close', 'start ↔ stop/finish', 'arrive ↔ leave'. Qarama-qarshi fe'llarni juftlik qilib o'rganish oson.
Mening onam hamyonini ochdi chunki unga pul kerak edi.
Yo'q, men yubormadim. Men xat oldim!
'i before e, except after c' qoidasi: receive, ceiling, receipt — 'c' dan keyin 'ei'. Believe, friend — 'c' siz 'ie'.
Mening singlim kecha kitob oldi va u juda xursand edi.
Yo'q, men dam olmadim. Men shiftni bo'yadim!
'Paint' = 1) bo'yamoq (paint a wall / a room) 2) rasm chizmoq (paint a picture). 'Painter' = rassom YOKI bo'yoqchi.
Mening akam kecha xonasini bo'yadi chunki u ko'k rangni yaxshi ko'radi.
Yo'q, men jonli ijro etmadim. Men albom yozib oldim!
'REcord' (urg'u 1-bo'g'inda) = ism (yozuv). 'reCORD' (urg'u 2-bo'g'inda) = fe'l (yozib olmoq). Urg'u o'rnini o'zgartirsa, ma'no o'zgaradi!
U o'tgan hafta video yozib oldi.
Mening sevimli qo'shiqchim yangi qo'shiq yozib oldi va men uni yaxshi ko'raman!
